posts.post_content:
I have loved these for years but never really did much with them. I am looking for affordable, raw T207's. Let me know what you have...

Thanks,

Tom

Hi Tom,
This is my only double.  $10 delivered?
Tony

OK, received one in the mail today. Anyone else have any T207's to sell? I will work on getting some trade bait together (need to raid storage back in VA next week). In the mean time....

Tom

Hey Tom,

I have some that may fit your needs - see the Sale/Trade link in my sig.

--
Mike

Thanks to all those that have reached out and answered my call for T207's. I will resist the urge to comment on my recent pick-ups until they arrive to their new home, right here in my collection! That being said, I have made several deals for numerous cards. I am still open and looking but my want / fill list is getting somewhat smaller. But you better act now, I am in negotiations to possibly puchase a 1964 Dodge Dart so my card funds may be finally drying up.

Thanks again to those that have really helped me out with this new direction to my collection.

Tom

OK, no go on the Dodge Dart. So I am still looking for T207's. Thanks to all those that have helped out so far!! I would be interested in raw and low grade HOFers as well so by all means, send me an email, PM, smoke signal, carrier pidgeon with your cards available lists!

Thanks again,

Tom
